hero.title: Customer Acquisition Specialists
hero.subtitle: At octo.hub, we help businesses build an efficient sales process to attract more customers, increase revenue, and scale results. We create full digital marketing solutions focused on performance and real growth.
why.title: Why choose octo?
why.desc: We offer integrated solutions that deliver real results for your business.
why.methodologies.title: Proven Methodologies
why.methodologies.text: Tailor‑made marketing and sales strategies that have helped dozens of entrepreneurs acquire clients and increase profit margins.
why.team.title: Specialized Team
why.team.text: A complete team of specialists in social media, paid traffic, funnels and CRM working to boost your results.
why.impact.title: Impact Strategies
why.impact.text: Content and ads that attract and engage your audience, increasing visibility and generating business opportunities.
partners.title: Who trusts
process.title: 4 STEPS TO RESULTS
process.desc: Achieve results more simply than you imagine
process.step1.title: Talk to a Specialist
process.step1.text: It all starts with a chat with one of our marketing and sales specialists, who will understand your business specifics and find the best growth opportunities.
process.step2.title: Diagnosis of Your Current Scenario
process.step2.text: We conduct an in‑depth analysis of your online presence to identify improvements and reveal the best opportunities to attract qualified leads.
process.step3.title: Strategy Implementation
process.step3.text: Our team develops personalized campaigns focused on direct client acquisition, digital positioning and process automation — keeping your company ahead of the competition.
process.step4.title: Visible Results in up to 3 Months
process.step4.text: Within 3 months, you’ll see concrete results: qualified lead generation and sales growth.
services.title: Our Tentacles
services.desc: Integrated solutions that adapt to your business needs, always aligned with the core objective.
services.web.title: Web Development
services.web.desc: Sites, apps and platforms focused on user experience and performance.
services.marketing.title: Digital Marketing
services.marketing.desc: Integrated strategies to increase visibility, engagement and conversions.
services.crm.title: CRM and Sales Funnels
services.crm.desc: Customer management systems and sales process automation.
services.analytics.title: Data Analysis
services.analytics.desc: Turning data into insights for strategic decisions.
services.content.title: Strategic Content
services.content.desc: Persuasive and relevant copy for different channels and goals.
services.consulting.title: Digital Consulting
services.consulting.desc: Specialized guidance for digital transformation and growth.
about.title: Who are we?
about.text: octo.hub was created to centralize, in a single place, all the essential fronts for a business to succeed in the digital environment. We bring together marketing strategies, paid traffic, social media, automations, sales funnels and commercial consulting to offer a complete solution. We act as an extension of your team, connecting all areas that directly impact client acquisition and increased sales.
about.pillars.0.title: Client Focus
about.pillars.0.text: We put our clients at the center. Each strategy is designed to deliver real results and directly impact business growth.
about.pillars.1.title: Clarity and Efficiency
about.pillars.1.text: We are organized, objective and data‑driven. We value well‑structured processes that deliver value quickly and precisely.
about.pillars.2.title: Innovation with Purpose
about.pillars.2.text: We seek innovative solutions that make sense for each scenario and drive competitive advantage.
about.pillars.3.title: Results Above All
about.pillars.3.text: We work with clear goals, performance focus and actions that make a difference in your revenue.
team.title: Our Team
team.desc: Meet the professionals who make octo.hub happen. A multidisciplinary team, passionate and committed to results.
team.members.victor.role: Digital Specialist Focused on Metrics and Results
team.members.victor.desc: Responsible for turning data into strategic decisions, aligning performance with sustainable growth.
team.members.julia.role: Sales, CRM and Conversion Funnels Specialist
team.members.julia.desc: Structuring purchase journeys and relationship strategies oriented toward conversion.
team.members.gustavo.desc: Focused on performance and conversion, extracting the most from paid traffic tools.
team.members.evelyn.desc: Positions brands through strategic content and engagement campaigns on social networks.
